definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: A green variety of chrysoberyl used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一種綠色的金綠寶石，用作寶石。

sentences.english: Set an emerald in a pendant .
It is more precious than emeralds, and dearer than opals .
A mottled green rock composed of diabase.
sentences.chinese: 一種綠色的金綠寶石，用作寶石。

sentences.english: The second piece is emerald ring, it's very valuable.
sentences.chinese: 第二件是一個綠寶石戒指，價值連城。

sentences.english: She wore a string of turquoise round her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她脖子上戴着一串綠寶石。

sentences.english: It's made of gold and in the middle there's a big green emerald.
sentences.chinese: 它是純金打造的，在中間鑲嵌着一大顆綠寶石。

sentences.english: She liked necklaces made of turquoise, and long pendant earrings.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡綠寶石項鍊，及長墜飾耳環。

sentences.english: On each side of the emerald there's a diamond.
sentences.chinese: 在綠寶石的兩邊各鑲着磚石。

definition: treasure bowl (mythology)/fig. source of wealth/cornucopia/gold mine

pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1

definition: balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
